layer.name: Sacrifice
layer.definition: Pour out for others with no expectation of return.

questions.text: I enter into others' spiritual battles — their temptations, their pain, their darkness — to help pull them out, even when it costs me peace.
I bear spiritual burdens that aren't mine — I take on weight for others because they can't carry it alone.
I have walked with people through their worst seasons — not just encouraged from a distance, but entered into their suffering.
I make myself available for spiritual emergencies — interrupting my plans to respond to others' crises.
I have helped restore people who fell into serious sin — not just from a distance, but at relational risk to myself.
